## 14. Weekly Review Checklist

### Pre-Planning Session
- [ ] Collect all metrics (code, customers, revenue)
- [ ] Review git commits from the week
- [ ] Gather customer feedback/conversations
- [ ] Review time logs
- [ ] Calculate updated valuation
- [ ] Identify key wins and blockers

### During Planning Session
- [ ] Review last week's objectives (completion rate)
- [ ] Analyze valuation change and drivers
- [ ] Assess milestone progress
- [ ] Identify highest-value activities for next week
- [ ] Set top 3 priorities for next week
- [ ] Update roadmap if needed
- [ ] Document learnings and insights

### Post-Planning Session
- [ ] Commit this week's report to git
- [ ] Archive completed week's report
- [ ] Create next week's report from template
- [ ] Update project dashboard
- [ ] Share key metrics with stakeholders (if applicable)

---

## 15. Appendix: Data Collection Commands

### Quick Commands for Metrics Collection

```bash
# Count lines of code
find frontend/src backend/src -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" | xargs wc -l | tail -1

# Count files
find frontend/src backend/src -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" | wc -l

# Git activity this week
git log --since="1 week ago" --oneline --no-merges | wc -l

# Changed files this week
git log --since="1 week ago" --name-only --pretty=format: | sort -u | wc -l

# Commits by day
git log --since="1 week ago" --pretty=format:"%ad" --date=short | sort | uniq -c
```
